channel.title: Covid-19 Europe
channel.description: Here you can find information about Covid-19 in Europe

item.title: Global Health Summit
item.description: All united we will move forward
item.author: europa.eu

item.title: EU response to coronavirus
item.description: Find out the latest news on the EU's coordinated response to the coronavirus outbreak and the actions of the European Parliament.
item.author: euroa.eu

item.title: Coronavirus: Latest news on the pandemic, the vaccine and the end of the state of alarm | DIRECT
item.description: Celebrations without security measures, hugs and toasts at dawn to celebrate freedom of movement have created CHAOS
item.author: Natalia Vaquero

item.title: Novavax Announces Positive Data for Combined Coronavirus and Flu Vaccine
item.description: The biotech company has reported that the results of a preclinical study conducted show strong immune responses.
item.author: As.com

item.title: France puts a date on the end of outdoor masks
item.description: The Minister of Health of the Gallic country has confirmed that they already plan a near future without outdoor masks. It will depend on how the data evolves.
item.author: As.com

item.title: COVID-19: Travel and Transportation
item.description: Latest news on the Council's recommendations regarding travel measures during the COVID-19 pandemic

item.title: COVID-19: Council updates Recommendation on measures affecting free movement
item.description: The decision whether or not to restrict free movement to protect public health is a matter for the Member States; however, coordination on this matter is essential. On October 13, 2020, the Council adopted a Recommendation on a coordinated approach to restricting free movement in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
item.author: Verónica Huertas Cerdeira
